alert.note: Alert for McCormick (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 20 at 7:15PM EDT until July 20 at 8:15PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern McDuffie County in east central Georgia... Lincoln County in east central Georgia... McCormick County in central South Carolina... * Until 815 PM EDT. * At 714 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Russell State Park to Woodville to Mansfield, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Thomson, McCormick, Lincolnton, Elijah Clark State Park, Mccormick County Airport, Thomson-McDuffie County Airport, Wrightsboro, Parksville, Plum Branch, Bordeaux, Sweetwater Park, Thomson Fire Department, Knox Scout Reservation, Double Branches, Fishing Creek Public Hunting Area, Curry Hill, Chennault, New Hope, Long Cane Creek Picnic Area and Hickory Knob State Resort Park. This includes Interstate 20 in Georgia between mile markers 167 and 176. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows. Severe thunderstorms can produce large capsizing waves and frequent lightning. If on or near Lake Strom Thurmond move away from the water and take shelter!
